post.summary: Enroll VSBB v2/Monitor v2 into the system
post.description:
post structure:

    Enrollment:
        enrollment_id, enrollment_password -- required, provide authorisation to enroll, otherwise there must be a
                                              group in the system with 'new-registration' tag defined
    Identity and metadata:
        unique_key:str -- UUID or other unchanging unique identifier
        sku:str -- short identifier for the product class (vsbb.v2, vsbb.v1, vsbb.monitor.v1, vsbb.monitor.v2, monitor)
        public_key:str -- recorded in the node, otherwise unused
        metadata:dict -- stored and available for user introspection, keys that are specifically useful:

            name:str -- if provided, is used to set the node's name, e.g. because an installer entered it
            mac_address:str -- if provided, recorded on the node for quick reference/identification on network
            ips:List[str] -- list of ip addresses currently set on the node for reference/identification
            sku:str -- if provided, and sku is not provided at the top level, used as the sku (for daemons that
                       do their own metadata collection)

returns json structure with current configuration on success

post.summary: Check that the server's authentication passes
post.description:

return json structure with current config
